ResearchProjectDef.label: Transport Shuttle
ResearchProjectDef.description:
A spacer-tech shuttle designed for transit between surface and orbit, or between moons of a planetary system.
Passenger cap: 1 - 12 Travel speed: 25 Space flight: Yes Fuel capacity: 450L Fuel efficiency: 2.25 per tile Maximum distance: 200 tiles Cargo cap: 1,000kg

ResearchProjectDef.label: Transport Drone
ResearchProjectDef.description:
An advanced spacer-tech drone designed for transit between surface and orbit, or between moons of a planetary system. Made from an autonomous space drone for carrying passengers and cargo. Doesn't have load capacity of a transport shuttle, but much faster and more fuel efficient.
Passenger cap: 1 - 6 Travel speed: 40 Space flight: Yes Fuel capacity: 450L Fuel efficiency: 1.25 per tile Maximum distance: 360 tiles Cargo cap: 500kg
